name: Object Get Key
description: Extracts value from object by key path. Supports nested paths like 'user.name' or 'items[0].title'

outputs.name: error
outputs.description: Error if key not found and no default

settings.name: defaultValue
settings.label: Default Value
settings.description: Value to return if path not found (leave empty to emit error)

settings.name: useDefault
settings.label: Use Default
settings.description: Return default value instead of error when path not found
